title: Virgo Irelia
body:
Hi! continuing with the zodiac skinline...I present Irelia representing Virgo.

From the start I wanted Virgo to be Irelia, because she's a dancer and dancers tend to be perfectionist, but Virgo is not all about being perfect, is a really cerebral sign, being analytical is a strong feature in Virgo, and dunno about you but for me playing irelia is a quite analytical game where I have to think who am I gonna Q when, where, witch minion I'm gonna Q to escape and I always fail to achieve that XD anyway I'm ranting hope you enjoy the concept, ty <3

https://imgur.com/lS4uD4O

Aries - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/i2EB0gLl-zodiac-patheon
Taurus - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/OhqTZrLE-taurus-taliyah
Gemini - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/JIbr36RV-gemini-leblanc
Cancer - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/aMs9uQog-zodiac-diana
Leo - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/oUyPwGsd-leo-leona

replies.body: she looks like odyssey sona way too much
indeed while I was working on her I thought this has the same energy as Odyssey Sona hahaha and I'm not mad thats my favorite sona skin
Looks fucking amazing. Especially her legs and that outfit!
thanks a lot <3
Looks nice, but I think Camille would make more sense here
camille was my second option...but I wanted to play with the "virgin" representation in virgo.
But why shouldn't it be possible to achieve this with Camille?
I did some exploration with camille and putting her some sort of habit headpiece changed her silhouette a lot, also the color scheme im using for earth signs overlapped with her program skin
i look forward to you continuing this skinline, and inevitably seeing evelynn, elise, or viktor as scorpio :)

You realize there is a LITERAL scorpion in the game, right?

Although I wouldn't be surprised if you hadn't heard of him.

> [{quoted}](name=FrancisMuni,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6GEpwWhp,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-11-19T10:19:41.213+0000)
>
> You realize there is a LITERAL scorpion in the game, right?
> 
> Although I wouldn't be surprised if you hadn't heard of him.

given that he's probably my 4th most played jungler, yes I know about skarner. He would not fit as scorpio, just as alistar would not fit as taurus, and nami would not fit as pisces.

Looking at the champions OP has used for their concepts to this point, it seems that they are chosing human-looking champions for their skin line mostly. 

If they would go with literal representation like you suggest with Skarner here, then they also would have picked Alistar instead of Taliyah to represent taurus, but they didn't.
YES!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} you made my sign pretty i love

These are always well-made. Great job! Is Aquarius next?!

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
thanks! libra is next
